question: could u please interpret my dream? inside the mosque in Saudi Arabia and I was listening to Shaikh Sodais
answer:
QUESTION
I dreamt I was sitting inside the mosque in Saudi Arabia and I was listening to Shaikh Sodais I did not see him although I was aware he was at the front reciting something and I was amongst lots of other people there.it was separated I was sitting with the women there.but I noticed that on the mens section the man I want to marry was also there.does this mean anything?
ANSWER


Share:
May Allah Ta?ala grant you a husband who is pious and associates with Ulama, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
